    • Method Detail

      • addPaymentMethod

        public PaymentTypesResponse addPaymentMethod(Long accountId,
                                    String firstName,
                                    String lastName,
                                    String address,
                                    String city,
                                    String state,
                                    String postalCode,
                                    String phone,
                                    String creditCardNumber,
                                    String expirationDate,
                                    String ccv,
                                    String paymentMethodNickname,
                                    Boolean defaultPaymentMethod,
                                    String authToken,
                                    Enums.PaymentMethodProvider provider)
                                      throws SirqulException
        Add a new billing account information and credit card on file.

        Target API Endpoint: /billing/create
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the the request
        firstName - The first name on the credit card
        lastName - The last name on the credit card
        address - The billing address of the credit card
        city - The billing city of the credit card
        state - The billing state of the credit card
        postalCode - The billing zip code of the credit card
        phone - The billing phone of the credit card
        creditCardNumber - The full credit card number to store on file
        expirationDate - The credit card expiration date YYYY-MM
        ccv - The 3 digit confirmation code
        paymentMethodNickname - The nickname to give the payment method
        defaultPaymentMethod - Whether this should be the default payment method
        authToken - an authorization token for providers that provide this (like Amazon Payments)
        provider - the payment provider (see Enums.PaymentMethodProvider
        Returns:
        a PaymentTypesResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

        Returns:

      • purchaseWithCardOnFile

        public SirqulResponse purchaseWithCardOnFile(Long accountId,
                                    Long offerId,
                                    Long offerLocationId,
                                    Long offerTransactionId)
                                      throws SirqulException
        Purchase an offer with the credit card on file.

        Target API Endpoint: /billing/purchase/cardonfile
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the the request
        offerId - The ID of the offer being purchased (either offerId or offerLocationId is required)
        offerLocationId - The ID of the offer location being purchased (either offerId or offerLocationId is required)
        offerTransactionId - The ID of the offer transaction being updated (either offerId, offerLocationId, or offerTransactionId is required)
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message if success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • purchaseWithCreditOnFile

        public SirqulResponse purchaseWithCreditOnFile(Long accountId,
                                      Long offerId,
                                      Long offerLocationId,
                                      Long offerTransactionId)
                                        throws SirqulException
        Purchase an offer with available credits on file.

        Target API Endpoint: /billing/purchase/credit
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the the request
        offerId - The ID of the offer being purchased (either offerId, offerLocationId, or offerTransactionId is required)
        offerLocationId - The ID of the offer location being purchased (either offerId, offerLocationId, or offerTransactionId is required)
        offerTransactionId - The ID of the offer transaction being updated (either offerId, offerLocationId, or offerTransactionId is required)
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message if success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • purchaseWithNewCard

        public SirqulResponse purchaseWithNewCard(Long accountId,
                                 Long offerId,
                                 Long offerLocationId,
                                 Long offerTransactionId,
                                 String firstName,
                                 String lastName,
                                 String address,
                                 String city,
                                 String state,
                                 String postalCode,
                                 String phone,
                                 String creditCardNumber,
                                 String expirationDate,
                                 String ccv)
                                   throws SirqulException
        Purchase an offer by adding a new billing account and credit card.

        Target API Endpoint: /billing/purchase/newcard
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the the request
        offerId - the offer id
        offerLocationId - The ID of the offer location being purchased
        offerTransactionId - the offer transaction id
        firstName - The first name on the credit card
        lastName - The last name on the credit card
        address - The billing address of the credit card
        city - The billing city of the credit card
        state - The billing state of the credit card
        postalCode - The billing zip code of the credit card
        phone - The billing phone of the credit card
        creditCardNumber - The full credit card number to store on file
        expirationDate - The credit card expiration date MM/YYYY
        ccv - The 3 digit confirmation code
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message if success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updatePaymentMethod

        public PaymentTypesResponse updatePaymentMethod(Long accountId,
                                       String creditCardNumber,
                                       String expirationDate,
                                       String name,
                                       String ccv)
                                         throws SirqulException
        Replace the current card on file with a new one.

        Target API Endpoint: /billing/update
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the the request
        creditCardNumber - The full credit card number to store on file
        expirationDate - The credit card expiration date YYYY-MM
        name - The full name on the credit card
        ccv - The 3 digit confirmation code
        Returns:
        a PaymentTypesResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
